title: Lavasoft Ad-Aware 2007 Pro v7.0.2.7 (licensed)
description:
Ad-Aware 2007 Pro provides advanced features for IT professionals and savvy computer users for optimal control of scans, malware removal, and damage repair.

Advanced features for advanced users!
    * Malware and spyware installations monitored by Ad-Watch
    * Detect unauthorized Internet connections with Ad-Watch Connect
    * Web navigation control with the Hosts File Editor
    * Protection against registry changes with RegShield
    * Internet surfing tracks erased by TrackSweep
    * Automatic scan set-up in The Scheduler
    * Incremental threat updates for faster downloads
    * Free software updates throughout license duration
    * Free technical and customer support

More feature details

Process Watch Module - View an in-depth snapshot of all running processes and quickly stop known offenders.

Advanced Code Sequence Identification (CSI) Technology - Ensure your privacy protection with precise detection of embedded malware including Trojans, worms, spyware, and other forms of deceptive malware.

Ad-Watch Real-Time Monitor - Immediate detection of malware and spyware means deceptive applications can be safely removed before they are able to cause any damage to your PC.

The Scheduler - Automatic scans set to your personalized schedule optimize time and resources.

TrackSweep - Control your privacy by erasing tracks left behind while surfing the Web on multiple browsers, including Internet Explorer, Firefox, and Opera, with one easy click.

Ad-Watch RegShield - Improved protection against attempted registry changes, a favorite target for many malware distributors.

Ad-Watch Connect - Open a new channel to identify keyloggers and identity theft attempts with this convenient snapshot of programs actively connected to other networks.

Hosts File Editor - Take control of your Web navigation by blocking advertisement sites, reversing browser hijack entries, assisting with parental controls, and creating navigation shortcuts.

System Restore Point - Easily revert to your clean system to recover from a spyware attack.


*Notes about the torrent*
Integrated the MKDEV-TEAM crack to allow for a pre-cracked/licensed version at first install so you don&#039;t have to crack manually.  

*Instructions about updating the program*
When you check for updates, it will ask if you want to check for program updates as well.  At the time of this posting, there was only one update available, that being LicenseDll.  Obviously you should *not* update the license at all since you will then lose the Pro functionality and the program will turn into the Free version!

In case that does happen, you can easily uninstall and reinstall the program to go back to Pro status!
